mapper.insert: insert into review (id, isbn13, cover, linetitle, content, score, created, lastmodified, challengeperiod) values (#{id}, #{isbn13}, #{cover}, #{linetitle}, #{content}, #{score}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: select * from review order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into reviewcomm (id, reviewno, content, created) values (#{id}, #{reviewno}, #{content}, now())
